# Preparation 
```{r}
#| message: FALSE
here::i_am("r-101-grade-analysis.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
library(ggplot2)

library(tidyr)
```

# Question 1 
```{r}
grades <- vroom(here("grades.csv"))
```
# Question 2
```{r}
grades |> 
  filter(!is.na(Exam))|> 
  summarise( min = min(Exam), max = max(Exam), median = median(Exam), mean = mean(Exam))|> 
  knitr::kable()
  
```
